title: (x) 'Commercial' sign-painter caps / ID this font for a sign job!!!! PLEASE! - various alternatives {Mike Y, Jeffrey}
author: mtomecko

comments.content:
Looks similar to [Sign Language](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323055200/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/sign-language/) from Comicraft, and also the [House Sign Painter collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323055200/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit/viewfonts)'s House Brush and House Slant. This is definitely some sort of sign painter's font, even though none of those I mentioned is exactly the same, they are close.

- Mike Yanega

First of all: could you please stop SCREAMING your requests !!! There is absolutely no neccesity to raise your voice to get ahead of the pack. If people want to help, they will help. Have the decency to stay polite and the patience to wait. However 'urgent' your request may be. Thanks.

As for the typeface: I couldn't find an exact match, but [Challenge](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323055200/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/challenge-bold/plain/) is very close. There's tons of simular fonts about, also freefonts.

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323055200/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)
